resources.string:
● UA Storm gear uses a DWR finish to repel water without sacrificing breathability. 
 ● Textured Armour Fleece has a brushed inner layer & a smooth outer layer. 
 ● Soft inner layer traps heat to keep you warm & comfortable. 
 ● 3-piece hood construction for superior fit. 
 ● Front kangaroo pocket. 
 ● Full, loose fit for enhanced range of motion & breathable comfort no matter where your workout takes you. 
 ● 100% polyester. 
 ● Machine wash cold, tumble dry low. 
 ● Imported.

Expedited orders placed before 1 PM Pacific on a business day will be shipped out the same day. All other orders will be shipped out the next business day. \n\n Due to high alcohol content, items such as fragrances, hairspray and aftershave will be sent via ground shipping (5-7 business days).
The paypal payment method is not live. This is just a demonstration and no money will be used in the process.
This message for paypal. You can give instructions here.
This message for Cash On Delivery. You can give instructions here. Issue payment to the delivery man.
